name: Line Runner 2D
description:
Line Runner 2D is a very simple Hyper Casual Infinite Runner type game and the goal is to simply score as much as possible. 

Interesting thing to note here is that the game starts slow and easier, then more easier, more easier, and a little more easier, but once you reach a score of 1000 then it begins to get harder and your Goal becomes to not die. 

Post YOUR SCORES in the COMMENTS. My Highest Score was 1680. I challenge you to beat me to it. 

I have release the code for the game as well. 

Enjoy and I would love to have some constructive feedback as I have recently started learning Unity and all my small projects are a way for me to grow.
